mapper.select: SELECT S.*, P.AREA_NAME AS parent_area_name, A.AREA_NAME FROM STORE S, AREA A, AREA P WHERE S.STORE_IDX=#{store_idx} AND S.STORE_AREA=A.AREA_IDX AND P.AREA_IDX=A.PARENT_IDX
SELECT * FROM STORE_IMG WHERE STORE_IDX=#{store_idx} ORDER BY IMG_ORDER ASC
SELECT * FROM STORE_NEWS WHERE STORE_IDX=#{store_idx} ORDER BY S_NEWS_IDX DESC
SELECT * FROM MENU_CATE WHERE STORE_IDX=#{store_idx} ORDER BY M_CATE_IDX ASC
SELECT * FROM MENU WHERE M_CATE_IDX IN ( SELECT M_CATE_IDX FROM MENU_CATE WHERE STORE_IDX=#{store_idx} )

SELECT C.*, K.CATE_KEY_NAME, V.CATE_VALUE_NAME FROM CATEGORY C, CATE_KEY K, CATE_VALUE V WHERE C.STORE_IDX=#{store_idx} AND C.CATE_KEY_IDX=( SELECT CATE_KEY_IDX FROM CATE_KEY WHERE CATE_KEY_NAME = '편의시설' ) AND C.CATE_KEY_IDX=K.CATE_KEY_IDX AND C.CATE_VALUE_IDX=V.CATE_VALUE_IDX
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JJIM WHERE STORE_IDX=#{store_idx}
SELECT * FROM STORE_TIME WHERE STORE_IDX=#{store_idx} AND STIME_DAY=#{kor_today}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE RESERVE_IDX IN ( SELECT RESERVE_IDX FROM RESERVATION WHERE STORE_IDX = #{store_idx} ) AND REV_STATE=1
SELECT COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(REV_SCORE), 1), 0) FROM REVIEW WHERE RESERVE_IDX IN ( SELECT RESERVE_IDX FROM RESERVATION WHERE STORE_IDX = #{store_idx} ) AND REV_STATE = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JJIM WHERE USER_IDX=#{user_idx} AND STORE_IDX=#{store_idx}
SELECT STORE_IDX, STORE_NAME FROM STORE WHERE STORE_IDX = #{store_idx}

SELECT R.*, U.USER_NICKNAME, U.PROFILE_IMAGE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN RESERVATION RES ON R.RESERVE_IDX = RES.RESERVE_IDX INNER JOIN USER_PROFILE U ON RES.USER_IDX = U.USER_IDX WHERE RES.STORE_IDX = #{store_idx} ORDER BY R.REV_WRITEDATE DESC

SELECT * FROM MENU WHERE MENU_IDX IN
#{menuIdx}

SELECT CATE_VALUE_NAME FROM CATE_VALUE WHERE CATE_VALUE_IDX = ( SELECT CATE_VALUE_IDX FROM CATEGORY WHERE STORE_IDX = #{store_idx} AND CATE_KEY_IDX = ( SELECT CATE_KEY_IDX FROM CATE_KEY WHERE CATE_KEY_NAME='음식 종류' ) )
